item.title: African Languages: Assessing the text input difficulty
item.description: Citeable as: Hugh J. Paterson III (2015) African Languages: Assessing the text input difficulty. Paper presented at the 46th Annual Conference of African Linguistics. Held at the University of Oregon 26th-28th March 2015 Bibliography for Presentation Bailey, Dwayne. 2007. Creating a single South African keyboard layout to promote language. Lexikos 17.1: 212-25. http://www.ajol.info/index.php/lex/article/view/51533 Bellman, Tom & I. Scott MacKenzie. 1998. A Probabilistic Character Layout Strategy for Mobile Text Entry.
